issue.title: [Rust] Support filtering on primitive/string lists
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5350](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5350). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently only filter on primitive types, but not on lists and structs. Add the ability to filter on nested array types

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5350?focusedCommentId=17216100) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8364
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8364>
